bio:
BlueBeard Interactive, LLC is an outsourced B2B Lead Generation, Appointment Setting and Event Telemarketing firm.

BlueBeard Delivers the Results You Need. Cold calling is the single best way to create a pipeline of new opportunities. Cold calling is reliable and predictable; and with BlueBeard Interactive, it's now fast, affordable and easy. Even for the smallest business.Learn how BlueBeard can help your business. 

BlueBeard Event Marketing a Division of BlueBeard Interacitve, LLC will acquire and deliver the audience and/or sponsors that you need to your live or virtual event.BlueBeard provides Event Telemarketing for all types of events.We not only pack your event with qualified, interested attendees; we also support your event by collecting and organizing valuable and actionable marketing information about your attendees and your prospects, both before and after your event. That's what we call ROE: Return on Event.
B2B Lead Generation; Event Telemarketing; Market Research

How We Work for You
PARTNERSHIP
Bluebeard Interactive brings the tremendous power of on-demand lead generation to the smaller and medium sized business. We have planned every aspect of Bluebeard Interactive’s process to create irresistible value for any business that needs to close more sales.

Let’s explore how Bluebeard has planned for your success.

OUR UNIQUE VALUE PROPOSITION
Scalable call campaigns fit a wide range of budgets.
No startup fees and lower per-call fees than any other professional telemarketing agency.
Easy to understand terms. Our fees are transparent and fair. (See Pricing)
Multiple Industries: Lead generation for most industries and groups of targets: technical, academic, legal, medical, media, small business, professional service providers, and more. (See Industries)
B2B Only: We talk to decision makers, managers and gatekeepers daily. We only conduct business to business (B2B) campaigns, not the potentially troublesome calling of residences. We built our reputation upon partnerships with high-value-added businesses – like yours.
Small enough to care: In today’s world, you really need a skilled, knowledgeable business partner who will learn exactly what your organization needs – and who provides it for you. We will work to be this partner for your lead generation needs.
OUR PROCESS
Accountable and Dedicated: You will have a dedicated Bluebeard Account Manager who is personally responsible for every phase of your campaign. If you have any concerns or problems or you need to modify the campaign, your Account Manager is your single stop for information and action.
Best Practices: We set up your campaign using our proprietary onboarding process. We work with you to define every aspect of your campaign that will be important in making the calls – before we make the first call.
Integrated with Your Organization: Agents will act as members of your organization, if you like. They can identify themselves as your own employees or agents, as you prefer.

abstrac: JD taking Texas Bar in July - Looking for work in meantime
bio:
Hello,
 I am a law school graduate with significant law firm experience, specifically in insurance defense and construction litigation. I just moved from New Orleans to Austin.
I received my JD from Loyola, where I studied both Civil Law and Common Law curricula. I am taking the Texas Bar in July and want to work in the meantime in order to stay sharp, gain experience and possibly find a firm with the potential for a long-term, future relationship. I believe that what I may lack in long-term experience is more than made up for by my education, motivation, and ability to learn on the fly. I graduated at the top of my class and I was a member of the Loyola Law Review. I am highly motivated, exceptionally organized and I have
prior experience in a litigation environment involving trial preparation; I pay particular attention to detail and have excellent written and oral communication skills,as well as strong problem-solving skills and the ability to exercise independent judgment.

Additionally, I am a thorough,detail-oriented researcher and I am able to synthesize and summarize complex legal information into useful form. Most importantly, I am able to multi-task in a fast-paced work environment with a heavy
caseload. Finally, I am tech-savvy, and have excellent references, a polished appearance, a great sense of humor and a professional demeanor. Regarding salary, I would be comfortable with $55-65k; that would allow me to pay my bills and my ridiculously high student loans; however, I am open to discussion regarding compensation. I am interested in speaking with you about a position as a researcher/analyst/writer (basically a summer clerkship for a graduate) with the possibility of proving myself in order to secure a permanent position after I pass the bar in July.Frankly, I just want to work. Please contact me so we can discuss how I can meet your needs as an associate. Please see my attached resume.
Cheers,
Gavin Rush

abstrac: MAP Technology Solutions that work. Performance eceeding expectations.
bio:
M.A.P. IT Consulting is a full-service technology consulting firm that helps clients source or develop custom solutions to their fulfill their important business requirements.  A company with a proven track record of success, M.A.P. is a tested provider of fully functioning ERP systems, custom software applications and leading technology and business intelligence tools. 

We specialize in the AS400/iSeries systems and programming, EDI, and legacy modernition..

Our team of certified IT specialists will analyze your current environment or applications, identify your needs and develop solutions tailored to your specific business requirements and objectives.  We’ll work with you to implement the best solution for your business and provide additional quality assurances to help maximize your technology investment.

commnet: Very helpful and responsive. Even did a few iterations of the product. Will totally use again for future projects.
for Create a marketing document in InDesign.

Amanda was prompt and attentive. Although the project scope changed several times, Amanda dealt with the changes very well and still delivered the job as expected. We intend to use her for future projects.

bio:
ONLINE PORTFOLIO

http://www.wemakeprettythings.com

I have started and help start over 13 publications/magazines since 2000.

Amanda sure knows how to mix it up. She consistently blends her traditional print sensibilities with some wild digital techniques to create incredibly original designs. A fresh-faced publisher by the age of 21, Amanda has run some biggie national magazines and even started several of her own. Her quirky, humorous style often comes through in her design via little tongue-in-cheek touches that are uniquely hers (just look closely and you're sure to spot the goofiness). Amanda is a mean guitar player by night, and has created some rocking designs for major brands like Disney, Universal Studios, FOX Studios, Paramount, BCBG Max Azria, Honda, Wal*Mart, Norwegian, Frederick's of Hollywood, Tiffany & Co. and Cartier. A diehard design geek, she can (spookily) name fonts on sight, even after a few frosty mugs of Amstel Light.
50% upon job awarded, 50% on completion
